last_episode_to_air.name: The World Just Touches My Heart
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the season finale, Melissa McCarthy welcomes Jerry, a space expert; Caca, a soul singer; and Lele, a sugar artist. She also revisits some fun and inspirational moments with previous Little Big Shots.

name: Little Big Shots
overview: A comedy-variety series showcasing young musicians, singers, dancers and  every form of wunderkind in the country. Harvey goes toe-to-toe with  them in conversations and interviews, with hilarious results.

episodes.name: Little Bruce Lee
episodes.overview: Amazing kids featured in this preview episode include a 4-year-old basketball phenom, a 5-year-old mini Bruce Lee, and an incredible singing duo, as well as an enthusiastic spelling bee champ, and a sassy dancer who became an internet sensation.

episodes.name: Little Boy Blue
episodes.overview: Featured in the premiere are a 4-year-old piano prodigy, an amazing salsa dancing duo, a six-year-old choir conductor, a funny viral story teller, and an impressive, five-year-old animal hypnotist from China.

episodes.name: I'm Not a Princess
episodes.overview: Amazing kids featured include two talented New Orleans twins who play in a brass band, an incredible dancer and gymnast, a fast-talking auctioneer and an adorable 3-year-old American Ninja Warrior.

episodes.name: A One, Two Punch
episodes.overview: Extraordinary kids featured in this episode include identical-twin tap dancers, a talented young ventriloquist, an incredible boxer, a delightful dancer and an adorable 4-year-old reciting an inspirational poem.

episodes.name: Little Piece of Heavenly
episodes.overview: Amazing kids featured include a singer from England who became an Internet sensation, a gifted string quintet, a magician team of siblings and a spunky 5-year-old performer.

episodes.name: The Karate Kid
episodes.overview: Amazing kids featured include an incredible fiddler, a math genius, a martial arts master, impressive dancers and a gifted Motown performer.

episodes.name: Little Piano Man
episodes.overview: Extraordinary kids featured in this episode include an incredible 9-year-old “piano man,” yodeler, rock band, orchestra conductor, jazz singer from Norway and 6-year-old dancer who became a viral sensation.

episodes.name: The Idiom of Love
episodes.overview: Theater reviewer Iain, rapper Papa Jay, scooter trick rider Charley, ballet dancers Avery and Joziah and drum major Timmy join host Steve Harvey to wow America with their amazing talents!

episodes.name: Top 10 Moments
episodes.overview: Join host Steve Harvey as he looks at the top 10 moments from Season 1 along with incredible unseen moments and updates from your favorite talented youngsters!

episodes.name: We're Back
episodes.overview: The premiere will feature an adorable 5-year-old who is a huge fan of Abe Lincoln and can recite the Gettysburg Address, a charismatic 4-year-old worship leader, a 12-year-old singing sensation from the Philippines and a 6-year-old science wiz who enlists Harvey's help with an explosive experiment. Also wowing viewers will be a 6-year-old basketball phenom and You Tube sensation who gets a very special surprise on the show, and a 4-year-old anatomy expert who impresses Harvey with her knowledge of every bone in the human body.

episodes.name: Little Barber Shop
episodes.overview: The world's most extraordinarily fun and talented kids are featured in this family-friendly comedy/variety series executive produced by Ellen DeGeneres and Steve Harvey and hosted by Harvey. This week Harvey meets a 4-year-old girl who became a viral sensation after she decided to cut her own hair, a dynamic dance duo, a talented 6-year-old female drummer from Brazil, an amazing 7-year-old blind singer who performs the national anthem, a fun animal caller and acrobatic roller skaters from China who put on an incredible performance.

episodes.name: New Sheriff In Town
episodes.overview: Featured in this episode is a 5-year-old lasso-roping cowboy, an amazing 8-year-old slackliner from Japan, a blues guitarist from England, a 4-year-old geography wiz and two adorable girls who both became viral sensations.

episodes.name: The Princess and the Hot Dog
episodes.overview: This week's episode of the family-friendly series from executive producers Ellen DeGeneres and Steve Harvey features an adorable 4-year-old singer whose You Tube videos have been viewed by more than 80 million people, an incredible contortion and acrobatic youth cirque troupe and a young female wrestler. Other extraordinary kids appearing include piano-playing brothers from India, an inspirational singer and a young girl who became a viral sensation after dressing up as a hot dog on "Princess Day."

episodes.name: Tugging On The Harp Strings
episodes.overview: Amazing kids featured this week include an adorable 5-year-old kung fu expert, a talented 12-year-old singer/harpist from Romania and a remarkable 4-year-old Shakespeare expert. Incredible talents are also on display from a champion 8-year-old baton twirler, an accomplished 11-year-old comic book artist and a wildly enthusiastic 9-year-old from China who wows host Steve Harvey with his Latin dance moves.

episodes.name: Tiny Dancer
episodes.overview: This week's episode of the family-friendly series from executive producers Ellen DeGeneres and Steve Harvey features an adorable 7-year-old dancer, twin boxers, an 11-year-old professional knife thrower and a talented young gospel singer. Other extraordinary kids featured include a unique horse jumper and an amazing group of banjo players.

episodes.name: The Snail Whisperer
episodes.overview: Extraordinary kids featured this week include a 6-year-old snail whisperer, a talented family of fiddlers and step dancers, an incredible singer from Wales, quick-change artists and an accomplished 5-year-old pianist from China. Host Steve Harvey also catches up with Akash, the fan-favorite spelling bee champ from season one and gives him a special Harvey-style spelling challenge.

episodes.name: Bend It Like Bella
episodes.overview: Featured kids include skateboarding siblings from Japan, a singer and guitarist from Costa Rica, two young brothers with pizza-tossing skills, and a 10-year-old contortionist who excels at archery.

episodes.name: Little Big Steppers
episodes.overview: Extraordinary kids featured in this episode include a talented group of stepdancers, a passionate, 6-year-old environmentalist who became a viral sensation and an amazing piano prodigy who has performed multiple times at Carnegie Hall. Host Steve Harvey also visits with two engaging bilingual singers, a set of triplets with a unique card-throwing act and an adorable 4-year-old color guard.

episodes.name: Memory Lane
episodes.overview: Featured kids include two young tango dancers from Italy, a unicyclist and juggler, a talented singer, a memory expert and a 4-year-old internet sensation.

episodes.name: Little Big News
episodes.overview: Extraordinary kids featured in this episode include an 8-year-old newscaster, a 7-year-old stand-up comedian and a talented boy band from Mexico. Host Steve Harvey also visits with an impressive aerial acrobat from Moscow, sisters who became a viral sensation and two of the most accomplished young ping pong players in the U.S.

episodes.name: The Magic Johnsons
episodes.overview: Phenomenal kids featured this week include talented a capella singers who are siblings, an incredible young cellist, amazing performers from China and an impressive national gymnastics champion and Olympic hopeful. Host Steve Harvey also visits with a remarkable 12-year-old opera singer from Holland and an inspiring motivational speaker who is just 10 years old.

episodes.name: Third Time's a Charm
episodes.overview: A confident 4-year-old who belts out Frank Sinatra songs, a charming 9-year-old bubble artist from Germany, a 7-year-old math expert, and a 5-year-old presidential expert who recites John F. Kennedy's Inaugural Address. Also wowing viewers will be a 10-year-old contortionist, and a 12-year-old gospel singer who's voice will leave viewers singing his praises.

episodes.name: We're In La La Land
episodes.overview: A 6-year-old Irish dancer from Scotland, a classically trained trio of string players, foot juggling brothers from Ethiopia, and 3-year old viral sensation with his pet dog. Viewers will love our 4-year "La La Land" super fan, and very special performance from "America's Got Talent" little big shot, Angelica Hale.

episodes.name: Eggcellent Eggsperiment
episodes.overview: A 6-year-old hero who cares for veterans, a funky fiddler, a talented aerialist duo from the Ukraine, an amazing 8-year-old scientist with incredible experiments, a charming young farmer, and a extraordinary singer from Ireland is joined by music sensation, Pentatonix.

episodes.name: Little Miss Sunshine
episodes.overview: A remarkably talented drum line from Atlanta; an unforgettable singer-songwriter; a 6-year old inventor; a young soccer star with incredible skills; a pair of young human calculators; Darci Lynne Farmer performs.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Steve
episodes.overview: An 8-year-old magician; a young historian; a soulful singer from Canada; a "Beauty and the Beast" super fan; a 5-year-old basketball sportscaster; a young opera singer.

episodes.name: Too Many Chefs
episodes.overview: A singer from Spain; a 7-year-old chef from India; a 7-year-old one-armed golfer; the world's youngest author; a 10-year-old bass phenom; the strongest kid in the world.

episodes.name: Tour De Harvey
episodes.overview: A 3-year-old basketball player; a 9-year-old taekwondo champion; a young car expert; a 9-year-old cyclist and sports reporter; three singers from the Philippines; a drum prodigy; Sheila E. pays a visit.

episodes.name: Little Ninja Warrior
episodes.overview: A skilled snooker player from Ireland; a voice-over artist; a hip-hop dancer; a talented painter; gospel singer Caleb.

episodes.name: Give Us S'Mores
episodes.overview: A stellar jazz pianist, the world's youngest fitness expert, a witty 9-year old science ambassador, and a talented 7-year old dog trainer. Also, a soulful singing trio from the Philippines, and the return of America's favorite young cowboy and season 2 favorite, Blayze.

episodes.name: Steveosaurus Rex
episodes.overview: A 5-year-old librarian; a dinosaur expert; a young country singer; a champion log roller; a Rubik's Cube expert; a pair of gymnasts.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love
episodes.overview: An 8-year-old pianist, a 5-year-old space expert, the world's fastest kid, a young aerialist, a pair of brothers help each other overcome disabilities, and budding singer-songwriter EmiSunshine.

episodes.name: Little Big Holiday Special
episodes.overview: A special holiday episode featuring a powerhouse singer, a violinist, a gospel singer, a little boy and his dog, a singing superstar and a soul singer.

episodes.name: You Don't Have to Be Big, To Be a Big Deal
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy welcomes Bailey, a vacuum cleaner aficionado; Yiyi, a table tennis phenom; Jonah, “The King of Crochet”; Madison, “Miss Independent”; and Mateo, “The Mariachi Wonder.”

episodes.name: You Be You
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy welcomes Ruth and Rhoda, cross-country cycling sisters; Oliver, a future police officer; Avett, a piano prodigy; Yolanda, Martin Luther King Jr.’s activist granddaughter; and Hunnay, a hula champion.

episodes.name: Icing on the Cake
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy welcomes Soborno, a kid genius; Samaya, a basketball phenom and future Globetrotter; Samuel, a mini pastry chef; Mayli, a powerhouse dancer; and Brooke, an old-school music enthusiast.

episodes.name: Best Day Of My Life
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy introduces Aidan, a young magician; Parker, a pint-sized author; Joe, a doodle artist; Jerry, an astronomy expert; Ryan, a recycling CEO; and Ayn, a soul singer.

episodes.name: Great Big Little Music Show
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy brings a night of pint-sized musicians with WanMor, soul-singing brothers; Clifton & Melody, a sibling jazz/funk duo; Justin, a little drummer; and William, a piano prodigy.

episodes.name: On Top of the World
episodes.overview: The next generation of remarkable young people from all corners of the globe show off their impressive talents and share their inspiring stories in a celebration of the optimism, humor and resilience of the world’s most incredible kids.

episodes.name: I May Be Short But My Dreams Are Giant
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy welcomes Master Caleb, a mini motivational speaker; Savannah, an ASL singer; Valentino and Luca, brothers who are pros at basketball trick shots; Roman, an animal rescuer; Matthew, a clothing designer; and Kinley, a hip-hop dancer.

episodes.name: Be Mighty
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy welcomes Parson, a UPS superfan; Tutu, a master hairdresser; Sara, a national handwriting champion, and sister Veronica, with whom she shares a special bond; Parker, a pickle entrepreneur; and Victory, a multilingual opera singer.

episodes.name: Strong Is the New Pretty
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy introduces Sa'Miyah and Obin, a daddy and daughter dancing duo; Jack, a philanthropist; Dylan, a baseball expert; London, a jiujitsu world champion; Tessa, a supergirl dancer; and Graham, a young interior designer.

episodes.name: Together We'll See It Through
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy welcomes Colin, a dice stacker; Ella, Connecticut's Kid Governor; Charlie, an indoor skydiver; Brayden, an advocate for the homeless; and Annie, a soul singer; actress Kristen Bell makes a special appearance.

episodes.name: Endless Dreams That Are Reachable
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy introduces Havana, a young diplomat; Arren, a dynamite gymnast; Rosie, who is helping kids in the hospital embrace their beauty; Corbin, a ballet dancer; Finley, an Elvis tribute performer; and she follows up with some past Little Big Shots. Dancer Misty Copeland makes a special appearance.

episodes.name: Lean On Me
episodes.overview: Melissa McCarthy introduces Asher, a future Paralympian; Vivian, an advocate for women toy soldiers; Selah, one of the youngest climbers of El Capitan; Keedron, a gospel singer; and the Albert Kids, a group with a nose for detective work.

episodes.name: The World Just Touches My Heart
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Melissa McCarthy welcomes Jerry, a space expert; Caca, a soul singer; and Lele, a sugar artist. She also revisits some fun and inspirational moments with previous Little Big Shots.
